string.value: #b#p2081000##k from #b#m240000000##k villiage says he has some information for me...

I learned that Humans used to have strong will power to resist temptation, which prevented them from getting seduced by the monsters. But, #bwitch #p2060100##k took away the people's will power and since then, humans have been falling into seduction. I wonder if this is really true. Let's go ask #p2060100#.
You look like the strongest among human beings. Without a #bstrong will#k, it's impossible to be that powerful. Do you know fairies and herrings are not temped? Quite unlike humans.
Humans used to be like that. Magic of temptation, when used by monsters, work for monsters but not for those with pure will. Somebody ruined it. Do you know #bwitch #p2060100##k?
Destroying willpower is among #p2060100#'s many sins. She took all of the #bpower to resist temptation#k. Her hatred towards humanity made her sin.
You don't seem to believe it. Your experience will tell you everything. Were you ever tempted by a monster and couldn't control yourself? Exactly. That's the result of #b#p2060100#'s curse#k.

A will to resist temptation. It's hard to make it no matter how hard you train yourself because #p2060100# took it away. If you want it back, go to see #p2060100#. If you lose your mind, the whole world will be threatened. Please find your #bwill#k.
#p2060100# is studying magic somewhere in the deep sea. She won't give what you seek easily.
If you don't want to, then that's fine. Humans may not deserve to get their will back..
You came here deep in the sea. It must be urgent. What's the matter? I don't like anyone strong like you.
#b#p2060100##k is not willing to give the will.
